trans-unit.source: "sortBy" comparator functions take a model and return a numeric or string value by which the model should be ordered relative to others. "sort" comparator functions take two models, and return -1 if the first model should come before the second, 0 if they are of the same rank and 1 if the first model should come after.
trans-unit.target: “ sortBy”比较器函数采用一个模型，并返回一个数字或字符串值，通过该值应相对于其他模型对模型进行排序。“排序”比较功能采取两种模式，并返回 -1 如果第一种模式要来的前一秒， 0 如果它们是相同的等级和 1 如果第一个模型应该来了。

trans-unit.source: , perhaps even never, a good idea. Passing through a specific flag in the options for your event callback to look at, and choose to ignore, will usually work out better.
trans-unit.target: ，甚至从来没有一个好主意。在事件回调中通过选项中的特定标志来查看并选择忽略，通常会更好。

trans-unit.source: "add" (model, collection, options) — when a model is added to a collection.
trans-unit.target: “添加”（模型，集合，选项）—将模型添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: "change" (model, options) — when a model's attributes have changed.
trans-unit.target: “更改”（模型，选项）—模型的属性已更改。

trans-unit.source: "change:[attribute]" (model, value, options) — when a specific attribute has been updated.
trans-unit.target: “ change：[attribute]”（模型，值，选项）—更新了特定的属性。

trans-unit.source: "destroy" (model, collection, options) — when a model is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: “销毁”（模型，集合，选项）—模型被销毁时。

trans-unit.source: "error" (model_or_collection, xhr, options) — when a model's or collection's request to the server has failed.
trans-unit.target: “错误”（model_or_collection，xhr，选项）—当模型或集合对服务器的请求失败时。

trans-unit.source: "invalid" (model, error, options) — when a model's validation fails on the client.
trans-unit.target: “无效”（模型，错误，选项）—在客户端上模型验证失败时。

trans-unit.source: "remove" (model, collection, options) — when a model is removed from a collection.
trans-unit.target: “删除”（模型，集合，选项）-从集合中删除模型时。

trans-unit.source: "request" (model_or_collection, xhr, options) — when a model or collection has started a request to the server.
trans-unit.target: “请求”（model_or_collection，xhr，选项）—当模型或集合已开始向服务器发出请求时。

trans-unit.source: "reset" (collection, options) — when the collection's entire contents have been reset.
trans-unit.target: “ reset”（集合，选项）-集合的所有内容都已重置时。

trans-unit.source: "route" (route, params) — Fired by the router when
trans-unit.target: “ route”（路由，参数）-由路由器在以下情况触发

trans-unit.source: "route" (router, route, params) — Fired by history when
trans-unit.target: “路线”（路线，路线，参数）-由历史触发

trans-unit.source: "route:[name]" (params) — Fired by the router when a specific route is matched.
trans-unit.target: “ route：[name]”（参数）-匹配特定路由时由路由器触发。

trans-unit.source: "sort" (collection, options) — when the collection has been re-sorted.
trans-unit.target: “ sort”（集合，选项）-对集合进行重新排序时。

trans-unit.source: "sync" (model_or_collection, response, options) — when a model or collection has been successfully synced with the server.
trans-unit.target: “同步”（model_or_collection，响应，选项）—模型或集合已成功与服务器同步。

trans-unit.source: "update" (collection, options) — single event triggered after any number of models have been added, removed or changed in a collection.
trans-unit.target: “更新”（集合，选项）-在集合中添加，删除或更改任何数量的模型后触发的单个事件。

trans-unit.source: Backbone.sync is the function that Backbone calls every time it attempts to read or save a model to the server. By default, it uses jQuery.ajax to make a RESTful JSON request and returns a jqXHR. You can override it in order to use a different persistence strategy, such as WebSockets, XML transport, or Local Storage.
trans-unit.target: Backbone.sync是Backbone每次尝试读取模型或将模型保存到服务器时都会调用的函数。默认情况下，它使用 jQuery.ajax 发出RESTful JSON请求并返回jqXHR。您可以重写它以使用其他持久性策略，例如WebSockets，XML传输或本地存储。

trans-unit.source: Events is a module that can be mixed in to any object, giving the object the ability to bind and trigger custom named events. Events do not have to be declared before they are bound, and may take passed arguments. For example:
trans-unit.target: 事件是可以混入任何对象的模块，使对象能够绑定和触发自定义命名事件。事件不必在绑定之前进行声明，并且可以采用传递的参数。例如：

trans-unit.source: History serves as a global router (per frame) to handle hashchange events or pushState, match the appropriate route, and trigger callbacks. You shouldn't ever have to create one of these yourself since Backbone.history already contains one.
trans-unit.target: 历史记录充当全局路由器（每帧），以处理 hashchange 事件或 pushState ，匹配适当的路由并触发回调。因为 Backbone.history 已经包含其中之一，所以您不必自己创建其中之一。

trans-unit.source: Models are the heart of any JavaScript application, containing the interactive data as well as a large part of the logic surrounding it: conversions, validations, computed properties, and access control. You extend Backbone.Model with your domain-specific methods, and Model provides a basic set of functionality for managing changes.
trans-unit.target: 模型是任何JavaScript应用程序的心脏，它包含交互式数据以及围绕它的很大一部分逻辑：转换，验证，计算的属性和访问控制。使用特定于域的方法扩展Backbone.Model，然后Model提供了一组用于管理更改的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: extend correctly sets up the prototype chain, so subclasses created with extend can be further extended and subclassed as far as you like.
trans-unit.target: extend正确设置了原型链，因此可以根据需要进一步扩展和扩展使用extend创建的子类。

trans-unit.source: jQuery.ajax options can also be passed directly as fetch options, so to fetch a specific page of a paginated collection: Documents.fetch({data: {page: 3}})
trans-unit.target: jQuery.ajax选项也可以直接作为获取选项传递，以便获取分页集合的特定页面： Documents.fetch({data: {page: 3}})

trans-unit.source: model – the model to be saved (or collection to be read)
trans-unit.target: 模型 –要保存的模型（或要读取的集合）

trans-unit.source: options – success and error callbacks, and all other jQuery request options
trans-unit.target: 选项 –成功和错误回调，以及所有其他jQuery请求选项

trans-unit.source: parse is called by Backbone whenever a collection's models are returned by the server, in fetch. The function is passed the raw response object, and should return the array of model attributes to be added to the collection. The default implementation is a no-op, simply passing through the JSON response. Override this if you need to work with a preexisting API, or better namespace your responses.
trans-unit.target: 每当服务器在fetch中返回集合的模型时，Backbone就会调用parse。该函数将传递给原始 response 对象，并且应返回要添加到集合中的模型属性数组。默认实现是无操作，只需传递JSON响应即可。如果您需要使用预先存在的API，或者需要更好的命名空间，请重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: parse is called whenever a model's data is returned by the server, in fetch, and save. The function is passed the raw response object, and should return the attributes hash to be set on the model. The default implementation is a no-op, simply passing through the JSON response. Override this if you need to work with a preexisting API, or better namespace your responses.
trans-unit.target: 每当服务器在fetch和save中返回模型的数据时，都会调用parse。该函数将传递给原始 response 对象，并应返回要在模型上设置的属性哈希。默认实现是无操作，只需传递JSON响应即可。如果您需要使用预先存在的API，或者需要更好的命名空间，请重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: pushState support exists on a purely opt-in basis in Backbone. Older browsers that don't support pushState will continue to use hash-based URL fragments, and if a hash URL is visited by a pushState-capable browser, it will be transparently upgraded to the true URL. Note that using real URLs requires your web server to be able to correctly render those pages, so back-end changes are required as well. For example, if you have a route of /documents/100, your web server must be able to serve that page, if the browser visits that URL directly. For full search-engine crawlability, it's best to have the server generate the complete HTML for the page ... but if it's a web application, just rendering the same content you would have for the root URL, and filling in the rest with Backbone Views and JavaScript works fine.
trans-unit.target: 在Backbone中，pushState支持完全基于选择加入。较旧的不支持 pushState 的浏览器将继续使用基于哈希的URL片段，并且如果具有 pushState 的浏览器访问了哈希URL ，则将透明地升级为真实URL。请注意，使用真实URL要求您的Web服务器能够正确呈现这些页面，因此也需要进行后端更改。例如，如果您的路由为 /documents/100 ，如果浏览器直接访问该URL，则您的Web服务器必须能够提供该页面。为了获得完全的搜索引擎可爬网性，最好让服务器为页面生成完整的HTML ...但是，如果是Web应用程序，则只需呈现与根URL相同的内容，然后用Backbone填充其余内容即可。视图和JavaScript可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: save accepts success and error callbacks in the options hash, which will be passed the arguments (model, response, options). If a server-side validation fails, return a non-200 HTTP response code, along with an error response in text or JSON.
trans-unit.target: 在选项哈希中，save接受 success 和 error 回调，这些哈希将传递给参数 (model, response, options) 。如果服务器端验证失败，则返回非 200 HTTP响应代码以及文本或JSON错误响应。

trans-unit.source: "invalid" events are useful for providing coarse-grained error messages at the model or collection level.
trans-unit.target: "invalid" 事件对于在模型或集合级别提供粗粒度错误消息很有用。

trans-unit.source: mixin provides a way to enhance the base Backbone.Collection and any collections which extend it. This can be used to add generic methods (e.g. additional Underscore Methods).
trans-unit.target: mixin 提供了一种增强基础Backbone.Collection及其扩展的集合的方法。这可用于添加通用方法（例如，其他下划线方法）。

trans-unit.source: this.el can be resolved from a DOM selector string or an Element; otherwise it will be created from the view's tagName, className, id and attributes properties. If none are set, this.el is an empty div, which is often just fine. An el reference may also be passed in to the view's constructor.
trans-unit.target: this.el 可以从DOM选择器字符串或Element解析this.el；否则，它将根据视图的 tagName ， className ， id 和 attributes 属性创建。如果未设置，则 this.el 是一个空 div ，通常就可以了。一个EL也可以参照传递到视图的构造。

trans-unit.source: A cached jQuery object for the view's element. A handy reference instead of re-wrapping the DOM element all the time.
trans-unit.target: 为视图元素缓存的jQuery对象。一个方便的参考,而不是一直重新包装DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: A collection can also contain polymorphic models by overriding this property with a constructor that returns a model.
trans-unit.target: 通过用返回模型的构造函数覆盖这个属性,一个集合也可以包含多态模型。

trans-unit.source: A hash of attributes that will be set as HTML DOM element attributes on the view's el (id, class, data-properties, etc.), or a function that returns such a hash.
trans-unit.target: 将在视图的 el 上设置为HTML DOM元素属性的属性的哈希（id，class，data-properties等），或返回此类哈希的函数。

trans-unit.source: A model's unique identifier is stored under the id attribute. If you're directly communicating with a backend (CouchDB, MongoDB) that uses a different unique key, you may set a Model's idAttribute to transparently map from that key to id.
trans-unit.target: 模型的唯一标识符存储在 id 属性下。如果您直接与使用其他唯一键的后端（CouchDB，MongoDB）通信，则可以设置Model的 idAttribute ,以从该键透明地映射到 id 。

trans-unit.source: A nested optional route of "docs(/:section)(/:subsection)" will match #docs, #docs/faq, and #docs/faq/installing, passing "faq" to the action in the second case, and passing "faq" and "installing" to the action in the third.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的 "docs(/:section)(/:subsection)" 可选路线将匹配 #docs/faq ，＃docs / faq和 #docs #docs/faq/installing ，在第二种情况下将 "faq" 传递给操作，并传递第三 "faq" 和 "installing" 。

trans-unit.source: A route of "docs/:section(/:subsection)" will match #docs/faq and #docs/faq/installing, passing "faq" to the action in the first case, and passing "faq" and "installing" to the action in the second.
trans-unit.target: 的路线 "docs/:section(/:subsection)" 将匹配 #docs/faq 和 #docs/faq/installing ，传递 "faq" 的动作在第一种情况下，并通过 "faq" 和 "installing" 到第二个动作。

trans-unit.source: A route of "file/*path" will match #file/folder/file.txt, passing "folder/file.txt" to the action.
trans-unit.target: 路径 "file/*path" 将匹配 #file/folder/file.txt ，并将 "folder/file.txt" 传递给操作。

trans-unit.source: A single-event version of delegateEvents is available as delegate. In fact, delegateEvents is simply a multi-event wrapper around delegate. A counterpart to undelegateEvents is available as undelegate.
trans-unit.target: 单事件版本的委托事件可以作为 delegate 。实际上，委托事件只是围绕 delegate 的多事件包装器。 undelegateEvents 的对应项可以作为 undelegate 获得。

trans-unit.source: A special property of models, the cid or client id is a unique identifier automatically assigned to all models when they're first created. Client ids are handy when the model has not yet been saved to the server, and does not yet have its eventual true id, but already needs to be visible in the UI.
trans-unit.target: cid或client id是模型的特殊属性，是首次创建时自动分配给所有模型的唯一标识符。当模型尚未保存到服务器，并且还没有最终的真实ID时，客户端ID很方便，但是已经需要在UI中显示。

trans-unit.source: A special property of models, the id is an arbitrary string (integer id or UUID). If you set the id in the attributes hash, it will be copied onto the model as a direct property. model.id should not be manipulated directly, it should be modified only via model.set('id', …). Models can be retrieved by id from collections, and the id is used to generate model URLs by default.
trans-unit.target: 模型的特殊属性，id是任意字符串（整数id或UUID）。如果您在属性哈希中设置id，它将作为直接属性复制到模型上。 model.id 不应直接操作，而只能通过 model.set('id', …) 进行修改。可以通过id从集合中检索模型，并且该id默认用于生成模型URL。

trans-unit.source: Add a model (or an array of models) to the collection, firing an "add" event for each model, and an "update" event afterwards. If a model property is defined, you may also pass raw attributes objects and options, and have them be vivified as instances of the model using the provided options. Returns the added (or preexisting, if duplicate) models. Pass {at: index} to splice the model into the collection at the specified index. If you're adding models to the collection that are
trans-unit.target: 将模型（或模型数组）添加到集合中，为每个模型触发 "add" 事件，然后触发 "update" 事件。如果定义了模型属性，则还可以传递原始属性对象和选项，并使用提供的选项将它们作为模型的实例进行修改。返回添加的（或预先存在的，如果重复的话）模型。传递 {at: index} 以将模型拼接到指定 index 处的集合中。如果您要将模型添加到集合中

trans-unit.source: Add a model at the beginning of a collection. Takes the same options as add.
trans-unit.target: 在集合的开头添加模型。采用与add相同的选项。

trans-unit.source: Add a model at the end of a collection. Takes the same options as add.
trans-unit.target: 在集合的末尾添加模型。采用与add相同的选项。

trans-unit.source: Adding and removing models one at a time is all well and good, but sometimes you have so many models to change that you'd rather just update the collection in bulk. Use reset to replace a collection with a new list of models (or attribute hashes), triggering a single "reset" event on completion, and
trans-unit.target: 一次添加和删除一个模型是一件好事，但是有时候您要更改的模型太多，以至于只想批量更新即可。使用reset用新的模型列表（或属性哈希）替换集合，并在完成时触发单个 "reset" 事件，并且

trans-unit.source: All Backbone event methods also support an event map syntax, as an alternative to positional arguments:
trans-unit.target: 所有Backbone事件方法也支持事件图语法,作为位置参数的替代。

trans-unit.source: All views have a DOM element at all times (the el property), whether they've already been inserted into the page or not. In this fashion, views can be rendered at any time, and inserted into the DOM all at once, in order to get high-performance UI rendering with as few reflows and repaints as possible.
trans-unit.target: 所有视图始终都具有DOM元素（el属性），无论它们是否已经插入到页面中。以这种方式，视图可以随时呈现，并一次全部插入到DOM中，从而以尽可能少的重排和重画获得高性能的UI呈现。

trans-unit.source: Any event that is triggered on a model in a collection will also be triggered on the collection directly, for convenience. This allows you to listen for changes to specific attributes in any model in a collection, for example: documents.on("change:selected", ...)
trans-unit.target: 为了方便起见，在集合中的模型上触发的任何事件也将直接在集合上触发。这使您可以侦听集合中任何模型中特定属性的更改，例如： documents.on("change:selected", ...)

trans-unit.target: 例如，响应来自 Backbone 的 "update" 调用的Rails 4处理程序可能如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Backbone is agnostic with respect to your preferred method of HTML templating. Your render function could even munge together an HTML string, or use document.createElement to generate a DOM tree. However, we suggest choosing a nice JavaScript templating library. Mustache.js, Haml-js, and Eco are all fine alternatives. Because Underscore.js is already on the page, _.template is available, and is an excellent choice if you prefer simple interpolated-JavaScript style templates.
trans-unit.target: 对于您首选的HTML模板制作方法，骨干网是不可知的。您的渲染函数甚至可以将HTML字符串合并在一起，或者使用 document.createElement 生成DOM树。但是，我们建议选择一个不错的JavaScript模板库。Mustache.js，Haml-js和Eco都是不错的选择。由于Underscore.js已经在页面上，_.template是可用的，并且是一个很好的选择，如果你喜欢简单的插入JavaScript的样式模板。

trans-unit.source: Backbone proxies to Underscore.js to provide 46 iteration functions on Backbone.Collection. They aren't all documented here, but you can take a look at the Underscore documentation for the full details…
trans-unit.target: Backbone代理Underscore.js在Backbone.Collection上提供46个迭代函数。它们并没有全部记录在这里，但是您可以查看Underscore文档以获取全部详细信息……

trans-unit.source: Backbone proxies to Underscore.js to provide 9 object functions on Backbone.Model. They aren't all documented here, but you can take a look at the Underscore documentation for the full details…
trans-unit.target: Backbone代理Underscore.js在Backbone.Model上提供9个对象函数。它们并没有全部记录在这里，但是您可以查看Underscore文档以获取全部详细信息……

trans-unit.source: Backbone views are almost more convention than they are code — they don't determine anything about your HTML or CSS for you, and can be used with any JavaScript templating library. The general idea is to organize your interface into logical views, backed by models, each of which can be updated independently when the model changes, without having to redraw the page. Instead of digging into a JSON object, looking up an element in the DOM, and updating the HTML by hand, you can bind your view's render function to the model's "change" event — and now everywhere that model data is displayed in the UI, it is always immediately up to date.
trans-unit.target: 骨干视图几乎比代码更符合惯例-它们不会为您确定有关HTML或CSS的任何内容，并且可以与任何JavaScript模板库一起使用。通常的想法是将界面组织成由模型支持的逻辑视图，当模型更改时，每个视图都可以独立更新，而不必重新绘制页面。您可以将视图的 render 函数绑定到模型的 "change" 事件上，而无需深入研究JSON对象，在DOM中查找元素并手动更新HTML，现在可以在UI中显示模型数据的任何地方，它总是立即更新。

trans-unit.source: Backbone will automatically attach the event listeners at instantiation time, right before invoking initialize.
trans-unit.target: 在调用initialize之前，Backbone会在实例化时自动附加事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Because hash-based history in Internet Explorer relies on an <iframe>, be sure to call start() only after the DOM is ready.
trans-unit.target: 因为Internet Explorer中基于哈希的历史记录依赖于 <iframe> ，所以请确保仅在DOM准备就绪后才调用 start() 。

trans-unit.source: Bind a callback function to an object. The callback will be invoked whenever the event is fired. If you have a large number of different events on a page, the convention is to use colons to namespace them: "poll:start", or "change:selection". The event string may also be a space-delimited list of several events...
trans-unit.target: 将回调函数绑定到对象。每当触发事件时，都会调用该回调。如果页面上有大量不同的事件，则惯例是使用冒号为它们命名空间： "poll:start" 或 "change:selection" 。事件字符串也可以是多个事件的以空格分隔的列表...

trans-unit.source: Brief aside on super: JavaScript does not provide a simple way to call super — the function of the same name defined higher on the prototype chain. If you override a core function like set, or save, and you want to invoke the parent object's implementation, you'll have to explicitly call it, along these lines:
trans-unit.target: 除了 super 以外，简要介绍一下：JavaScript没有提供一种简单的方法来调用super-在原型链的较高位置定义的具有相同名称的功能。如果覆盖诸如 set 或 save 的核心函数，并且要调用父对象的实现，则必须按照以下方式显式调用它：

trans-unit.source: By default save checks validate before setting any attributes but you may also tell set to validate the new attributes by passing {validate: true} as an option. The validate method receives the model attributes as well as any options passed to set or save, if validate returns an error, save does not continue, the model attributes are not modified on the server, an "invalid" event is triggered, and the validationError property is set on the model with the value returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， save 检查会在设置任何属性之前进行验证，但是您也可以通过传递 {validate: true} 作为选项来告知 set 验证新属性。该验证方法接收模型属性以及任何选项传递给 set 或 save ，如果验证返回错误， save 不下去，该模型的属性不被修改的服务器，在 "invalid" 触发事件，以及 validationError 使用此方法返回的值在模型上设置属性。

trans-unit.source: By default returns the value of the attributes' idAttribute from the collection's model class or failing that, id. If your collection uses a model factory and those models have an idAttribute other than id you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，从集合的模型类返回属性的 idAttribute 的值，否则返回 id 。如果您的集合使用模型工厂，并且这些模型具有 id 以外的 idAttribute ，则必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: By default there is no comparator for a collection. If you define a comparator, it will be used to sort the collection any time a model is added. A comparator can be defined as a sortBy (pass a function that takes a single argument), as a sort (pass a comparator function that expects two arguments), or as a string indicating the attribute to sort by.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，没有用于集合的比较器。如果定义比较器，则在添加模型时将使用该比较器对集合进行排序。比较器可以定义为sortBy（传递带有单个参数的函数），排序（传递需要两个参数的比较器函数）或指示属性排序的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks bound to the special "all" event will be triggered when any event occurs, and are passed the name of the event as the first argument. For example, to proxy all events from one object to another:
trans-unit.target: 当发生任何事件时，将触发绑定到特殊 "all" 事件的回调，并将其作为第一个参数传递给事件的名称。例如，要将所有事件从一个对象代理到另一个对象：

trans-unit.source: Calling collection.reset() without passing any models as arguments will empty the entire collection.
trans-unit.target: 在不传递任何模型作为参数的情况下调用 collection.reset() 将清空整个集合。

trans-unit.source: Calling save with new attributes will cause a "change" event immediately, a "request" event as the Ajax request begins to go to the server, and a "sync" event after the server has acknowledged the successful change. Pass {wait: true} if you'd like to wait for the server before setting the new attributes on the model.
trans-unit.target: 调用具有新属性的 save 将立即导致 "change" 事件，随着Ajax请求开始进入服务器，将导致 "request" 事件，并且在服务器确认成功更改后将导致 "sync" 事件。如果要在模型上设置新属性之前等待服务器，请传递 {wait: true} 。

trans-unit.source: Collections are ordered sets of models. You can bind "change" events to be notified when any model in the collection has been modified, listen for "add" and "remove" events, fetch the collection from the server, and use a full suite of Underscore.js methods.
trans-unit.target: 集合是有序的模型集。您可以绑定 "change" 事件，以在修改集合中的任何模型时得到通知，侦听 "add" 和 "remove" 事件，从服务器 fetch 集合，并使用全套Underscore.js方法。

trans-unit.source: Collections with a comparator will not automatically re-sort if you later change model attributes, so you may wish to call sort after changing model attributes that would affect the order.
trans-unit.target: 如果以后更改模型属性，带有比较器的集合将不会自动重新排序，因此您可能希望在更改会影响顺序的模型属性后调用 sort 。

trans-unit.source: Convenience to create a new instance of a model within a collection. Equivalent to instantiating a model with a hash of attributes, saving the model to the server, and adding the model to the set after being successfully created. Returns the new model. If client-side validation failed, the model will be unsaved, with validation errors. In order for this to work, you should set the model property of the collection. The create method can accept either an attributes hash and options to be passed down during model instantiation or an existing, unsaved model object.
trans-unit.target: 方便在集合中创建模型的新实例。等效于使用属性哈希实例化模型，将模型保存到服务器，并在成功创建模型后将其添加到集合中。返回新模型。如果客户端验证失败，则该模型将无法保存，并出现验证错误。为了使它起作用，您应该设置集合的model属性。该创建方法可以接受的属性的散列和选项模型实例或现有的，未保存的模型对象中向下传递。

trans-unit.source: Creating a model will cause an immediate "add" event to be triggered on the collection, a "request" event as the new model is sent to the server, as well as a "sync" event, once the server has responded with the successful creation of the model. Pass {wait: true} if you'd like to wait for the server before adding the new model to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一旦服务器响应成功，创建模型将导致立即在集合上触发 "add" 事件，将新模型发送到服务器时触发 "request" 事件以及 "sync" 事件。模型的创建。如果要在将新模型添加到集合之前等待服务器，请传递 {wait: true} 。

trans-unit.source: Delegates to Collection#url to generate the URL, so make sure that you have it defined, or a urlRoot property, if all models of this class share a common root URL. A model with an id of 101, stored in a Backbone.Collection with a url of "/documents/7/notes", would have this URL: "/documents/7/notes/101"
trans-unit.target: 委托给Collection＃url生成URL，因此，如果此类的所有模型共享一个公共根URL ，请确保已定义该URL或urlRoot属性。一个ID为 101 的模型存储在Backbone.Collection中，其 url 为 "/documents/7/notes" ，将具有以下URL： "/documents/7/notes/101"

trans-unit.source: Destroys the model on the server by delegating an HTTP DELETE request to Backbone.sync. Returns a jqXHR object, or false if the model isNew. Accepts success and error callbacks in the options hash, which will be passed (model, response, options). Triggers a "destroy" event on the model, which will bubble up through any collections that contain it, a "request" event as it begins the Ajax request to the server, and a "sync" event, after the server has successfully acknowledged the model's deletion. Pass {wait: true} if you'd like to wait for the server to respond before removing the model from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 通过将HTTP DELETE 请求委托给Backbone.sync来破坏服务器上的模型。返回一个jqXHR对象，或 false 如果模型是否新款。在选项哈希中接受 success 和 error 回调，这些哈希将被传递 (model, response, options) 。触发模型上的 "destroy" 事件，该事件将在包含该模型的所有集合中冒泡，在服务器成功向服务器发起Ajax请求时触发 "request" 事件，并在服务器成功确认后触发 "sync" 事件模型的删除。通过 {wait: true} 如果您要等待服务器响应，然后再从集合中删除模型。

trans-unit.source: Due to the fact that Events accepts space separated lists of events, attribute names should not include spaces.
trans-unit.target: 由于“ 事件”接受以空格分隔的事件列表，因此属性名称不应包含空格。

trans-unit.source: During a "change" event, this method can be used to get the previous value of a changed attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在 "change" 事件期间，此方法可用于获取更改后的属性的先前值。

trans-unit.source: During page load, after your application has finished creating all of its routers, be sure to call Backbone.history.start() or Backbone.history.start({pushState: true}) to route the initial URL.
trans-unit.target: 在页面加载期间，您的应用程序完成所有路由器的创建后，请确保调用 Backbone.history.start() 或 Backbone.history.start({pushState: true}) 来路由初始URL。

trans-unit.source: Fetch the default set of models for this collection from the server, setting them on the collection when they arrive. The options hash takes success and error callbacks which will both be passed (collection, response, options) as arguments. When the model data returns from the server, it uses set to (intelligently) merge the fetched models, unless you pass {reset: true}, in which case the collection will be (efficiently) reset. Delegates to Backbone.sync under the covers for custom persistence strategies and returns a jqXHR. The server handler for fetch requests should return a JSON array of models.
trans-unit.target: 从服务器获取此集合的默认模型集，并在它们到达时在集合上进行设置。该选项散列接受 success 和 error ，这将既传递回调 (collection, response, options) 作为参数。当模型数据从服务器返回时，除非使用 {reset: true} ，否则它将使用set来（智能地）合并所获取的模型，在这种情况下，集合将被（有效地）reset。在自定义持久性策略的幕后委托给Backbone.sync并返回jqXHR。用于获取的服务器处理程序 请求应返回模型的JSON数组。

trans-unit.source: For example, a route of "search/:query/p:page" will match a fragment of #search/obama/p2, passing "obama" and "2" to the action as positional arguments.
trans-unit.target: 例如，路由 "search/:query/p:page" 将匹配 #search/obama/p2 的片段，并将 "obama" 和 "2" 作为位置参数传递给操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, to make a handy event dispatcher that can coordinate events among different areas of your application: var dispatcher = _.clone(Backbone.Events)
trans-unit.target: 例如，要创建一个方便的事件分发程序，它可以在应用程序的不同区域之间协调事件： var dispatcher = _.clone(Backbone.Events)

trans-unit.source: For use with collections as ES classes. If you define a preinitialize method, it will be invoked when the Collection is first created and before any instantiation logic is run for the Collection.
trans-unit.target: 与集合一起用作ES类。如果定义了预初始化方法，则该方法将在首次创建Collection时以及为Collection运行任何实例化逻辑之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: For use with models as ES classes. If you define a preinitialize method, it will be invoked when the Model is first created, before any instantiation logic is run for the Model.
trans-unit.target: 用于模型作为ES类。如果定义了预初始化方法，则在为模型运行任何实例化逻辑之前，将在首次创建模型时调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: For use with routers as ES classes. If you define a preinitialize method, it will be invoked when the Router is first created and before any instantiation logic is run for the Router.
trans-unit.target: 与路由器一起用作ES类。如果定义了预初始化方法，则该方法将在首次创建路由器时以及在为路由器运行任何实例化逻辑之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: For use with views as ES classes. If you define a preinitialize method, it will be invoked when the view is first created, before any instantiation logic is run.
trans-unit.target: 与ES类一起使用。如果定义了预初始化方法，则在运行任何实例化逻辑之前，将在首次创建视图时调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: Force a collection to re-sort itself. Note that a collection with a comparator will sort itself automatically whenever a model is added. To disable sorting when adding a model, pass {sort: false} to add. Calling sort triggers a "sort" event on the collection.
trans-unit.target: 强制集合重新排序。请注意，只要添加模型，带有比较器的集合将自动对自身进行排序。要在添加模型时禁用排序，请传递 {sort: false} 以 add 。调用sort会触发集合上的 "sort" 事件。

trans-unit.source: Generally speaking, when calling a function that emits an event (model.set, collection.add, and so on...), if you'd like to prevent the event from being triggered, you may pass {silent: true} as an option. Note that this is
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，当调用一个发出事件的函数（ model.set ， collection.add 等）时，如果您想防止事件被触发，则可以传递 {silent: true} 作为一个选项。请注意，这是

trans-unit.source: Get a model from a collection, specified by an id, a cid, or by passing in a model.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中获取模型，该模型由id，cid或传入model指定。

trans-unit.source: Get a model from a collection, specified by index. Useful if your collection is sorted, and if your collection isn't sorted, at will still retrieve models in insertion order. When passed a negative index, it will retrieve the model from the back of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从索引指定的集合中获取模型。有用的，如果您的集合进行排序，如果你的集合没有排序，在将仍然按插入顺序检索模型。当传递负索引时，它将从集合的后面检索模型。

trans-unit.source: Get started by creating a custom router class. Define action functions that are triggered when certain URL fragments are matched, and provide a routes hash that pairs routes to actions. Note that you'll want to avoid using a leading slash in your route definitions:
trans-unit.target: 通过创建自定义路由器类开始。定义在匹配某些URL片段时触发的动作功能，并提供将动作与路线配对的路线哈希。请注意，您将要避免在路径定义中使用斜杠：

trans-unit.source: Get started with views by creating a custom view class. You'll want to override the render function, specify your declarative events, and perhaps the tagName, className, or id of the View's root element.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建自定义视图类来开始使用视图。您将要覆盖render函数，指定声明性事件，以及View根元素的 tagName ， className 或 id 。

trans-unit.source: Get the current value of an attribute from the model. For example: note.get("title")
trans-unit.target: 从模型获取属性的当前值。例如： note.get("title")

trans-unit.source: Has the model changed since its last set? If an attribute is passed, returns true if that specific attribute has changed.
trans-unit.target: 自上次设定以来，模型是否已更改？如果传递了属性，则如果该特定属性已更改，则返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Has this model been saved to the server yet? If the model does not yet have an id, it is considered to be new.
trans-unit.target: 此模型是否已保存到服务器？如果模型还没有 id ，则将其视为新模型。

trans-unit.source: Here's an example using reset to bootstrap a collection during initial page load, in a Rails application:
trans-unit.target: 以下是在Rails应用程序中使用重置在初始页面加载期间引导集合的示例：

trans-unit.source: Here's the complete list of built-in Backbone events, with arguments. You're also free to trigger your own events on Models, Collections and Views as you see fit. The Backbone object itself mixes in Events, and can be used to emit any global events that your application needs.
trans-unit.target: 这是带有参数的内置Backbone事件的完整列表。您还可以根据自己的意愿在模型，集合和视图上触发自己的事件。该 Backbone 对象本身在混合 Events ，并且可以用来发出任何全球性事件，你的应用需求。

trans-unit.source: If {parse: true} is passed as an option, the attributes will first be converted by parse before being set on the model.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 {parse: true} 作为选项传递，则属性将首先通过解析转换，然后再在模型上进行设置。

trans-unit.source: If instead, you'd only like the

If jQuery is included on the page, each view has a $ function that runs queries scoped within the view's element. If you use this scoped jQuery function, you don't have to use model ids as part of your query to pull out specific elements in a list, and can rely much more on HTML class attributes. It's equivalent to running: view.$el.find(selector)
trans-unit.target: 如果页面上包含jQuery，则每个视图都有一个$函数，该函数运行在该视图元素内的查询。如果使用此范围内的jQuery函数，则不必在查询中使用模型ID即可提取列表中的特定元素，并且可以更多地依赖HTML类属性。等效于运行： view.$el.find(selector)

trans-unit.source: If the server has already rendered the entire page, and you don't want the initial route to trigger when starting History, pass silent: true.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器已经渲染了整个页面，并且您不希望在启动历史记录时触发初始路由，请传递 silent: true 。

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple copies of jQuery on the page, or simply want to tell Backbone to use a particular object as its DOM / Ajax library, this is the property for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果页面上有 jQuery 的多个副本，或者只是想告诉Backbone使用特定对象作为其DOM / Ajax库，则此属性适合您。

trans-unit.source: If you pass a {collection: ...} as the options, the model gains a collection property that will be used to indicate which collection the model belongs to, and is used to help compute the model's url. The model.collection property is normally created automatically when you first add a model to a collection. Note that the reverse is not true, as passing this option to the constructor will not automatically add the model to the collection. Useful, sometimes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您传递 {collection: ...} 作为选项，则模型将获得 collection 属性，该属性将用于指示模型属于哪个collection，并用于帮助计算模型的url。该 model.collection 当你第一次添加了一个模型来集合属性，通常会自动创建。请注意，相反情况并非如此，因为将此选项传递给构造函数不会自动将模型添加到集合中。有时有用。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a custom AJAX function, or your endpoint doesn't support the jQuery.ajax API and you need to tweak things, you can do so by setting Backbone.ajax.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想使用自定义AJAX函数，或者您的端点不支持jQuery.ajax API，并且需要进行调整，则可以通过设置 Backbone.ajax 来实现。

trans-unit.source: If you want to work with a legacy web server that doesn't support Backbone's default REST/HTTP approach, you may choose to turn on Backbone.emulateHTTP. Setting this option will fake PUT, PATCH and DELETE requests with a HTTP POST, setting the X-HTTP-Method-Override header with the true method. If emulateJSON is also on, the true method will be passed as an additional _method parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用不支持Backbone的默认REST / HTTP方法的旧式Web服务器，则可以选择打开 Backbone.emulateHTTP 。设置此选项将使用HTTP POST 伪造 PUT ， PATCH 和 DELETE 请求，并使用true方法设置 X-HTTP-Method-Override 标头。如果 emulateJSON 也处于打开状态，则true方法将作为附加的 _method 参数传递。

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to apply a Backbone view to a different DOM element, use setElement, which will also create the cached $el reference and move the view's delegated events from the old element to the new one.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想将Backbone视图应用于另一个DOM元素，请使用setElement，它还将创建缓存的 $el 引用，并将视图的委托事件从旧元素移到新元素。

trans-unit.source: If you're working with a Rails backend that has a version prior to 3.1, you'll notice that its default to_json implementation includes a model's attributes under a namespace. To disable this behavior for seamless Backbone integration, set:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是3.1之前的Rails后端，则会注意到它的默认 to_json 实现在名称空间下包括模型的属性。要为无缝骨干集成禁用此行为，请设置：

trans-unit.source: If you're working with a legacy web server that can't handle requests encoded as application/json, setting Backbone.emulateJSON = true; will cause the JSON to be serialized under a model parameter, and the request to be made with a application/x-www-form-urlencoded MIME type, as if from an HTML form.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用无法处理编码为 application/json 的请求的旧式Web服务器，请设置 Backbone.emulateJSON = true; 会导致JSON在 model 参数下进行序列化，并且请求使用 application/x-www-form-urlencoded MIME类型发出，就像从HTML表单中发出一样。

trans-unit.source: If your application is not being served from the root url / of your domain, be sure to tell History where the root really is, as an option: Backbone.history.start({pushState: true, root: "/public/search/"})
trans-unit.target: 如果您的应用不是从域的根url / 提供的，请确保告诉History根的真正位置，作为一种选择： Backbone.history.start({pushState: true, root: "/public/search/"})

trans-unit.source: In rare cases, if you're looking to get fancy, you may want to override constructor, which allows you to replace the actual constructor function for your model.
trans-unit.target: 在极少数情况下，如果您想花哨的话，则可能需要重写Constructor，它可以让您替换模型的实际构造函数。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, notice how our overridden version of Backbone.sync receives a "create" request the first time the model is saved and an "update" request the second time.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，请注意，我们覆盖的 Backbone.sync 版本如何在第一次保存模型时如何接收 "create" 请求，而在第二次保存模型时如何接收 "update" 请求。

trans-unit.source: Just like where, but directly returns only the first model in the collection that matches the passed attributes. If no model matches returns undefined.
trans-unit.target: 就像where一样，但是只直接返回集合中与传递的属性匹配的第一个模型。如果没有模型匹配，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Just like listenTo, but causes the bound callback to fire only once before being removed.
trans-unit.target: 就像listenTo一样，但是使绑定的回调仅在被删除之前触发一次。

trans-unit.source: Just like on, but causes the bound callback to fire only once before being removed. Handy for saying "the next time that X happens, do this". When multiple events are passed in using the space separated syntax, the event will fire once for every event you passed in, not once for a combination of all events
trans-unit.target: 就像on一样，但是使绑定的回调仅在被删除之前触发一次。方便地说“下次X发生时，执行此操作”。当使用空格分隔的语法传递多个事件时，该事件将针对您传入的每个事件触发一次，而不是针对所有事件的组合触发一次
根据麻省理工学院许可证授权。

trans-unit.source: Like an array, a Collection maintains a length property, counting the number of models it contains.
trans-unit.target: 像数组一样，Collection维护一个 length 属性，计算它包含的模型数量。

trans-unit.source: Manually create a route for the router, The route argument may be a routing string or regular expression. Each matching capture from the route or regular expression will be passed as an argument to the callback. The name argument will be triggered as a "route:name" event whenever the route is matched. If the callback argument is omitted router[name] will be used instead. Routes added later may override previously declared routes.
trans-unit.target: 手动为路由器创建路由， route 参数可以是路由字符串或正则表达式。路由或正则表达式中的每个匹配捕获都将作为参数传递给回调。该 name 参数将被触发为 "route:name" 每当路由匹配的事件。如果省略了 callback 参数，则将使用 router[name] 代替。以后添加的路由可能会覆盖先前声明的路由。

trans-unit.source: Merges the model's state with attributes fetched from the server by delegating to Backbone.sync. Returns a jqXHR. Useful if the model has never been populated with data, or if you'd like to ensure that you have the latest server state. Triggers a "change" event if the server's state differs from the current attributes. fetch accepts success and error callbacks in the options hash, which are both passed (model, response, options) as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 通过委派给Backbone.sync将模型的状态与从服务器获取的属性合并。返回jqXHR。如果模型从未填充过数据，或者您想确保自己具有最新的服务器状态，则很有用。如果服务器的状态不同于当前属性，则触发 "change" 事件。 fetch 在选项哈希中接受 success 和 error 回调，它们都作为参数传递 (model, response, options) 。

trans-unit.source: Most methods can take an object or string to support model-attribute-style predicates or a function that receives the model instance as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 大多数方法可以接受一个对象或字符串来支持模型属性式的谓词,或者接受模型实例作为参数的函数。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you won't need to define this. Note that urlRoot may also be a function.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您不需要定义它。请注意， urlRoot 也可能是一个函数。

trans-unit.source: Note how even though all of the chapters in this example are added backwards, they come out in the proper order:
trans-unit.target: 请注意,尽管这个例子中的所有章节都是倒着加的,但它们是按照正确的顺序出来的。

trans-unit.source: Note that fetch should not be used to populate collections on page load — all models needed at load time should already be bootstrapped in to place. fetch is intended for lazily-loading models for interfaces that are not needed immediately: for example, documents with collections of notes that may be toggled open and closed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在页面加载时，不应使用访存来填充集合-加载时所需的所有模型都应该已经被引导到位。fetch用于延迟加载不需要立即使用的接口的模型：例如，带有注释集合的文档可能会打开和关闭。

trans-unit.source: Note that Backbone depends on the arity of your comparator function to determine between the two styles, so be careful if your comparator function is bound.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,Backbone依赖于你的比较器函数的arity来决定两种风格之间的差异,所以如果你的比较器函数是绑定的,要小心。

trans-unit.source: Note that adding the same model (a model with the same id) to a collection more than once
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将同一模型（具有相同 id 的模型）多次添加到集合中

trans-unit.source: Note that calling model.off(), for example, will indeed remove
trans-unit.target: 请注意，例如，调用 model.off() 确实会删除

trans-unit.source: Note that this method, and the following change-related ones, are only useful during the course of a "change" event.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法以及以下与更改有关的方法仅在 "change" 事件过程中有用。

trans-unit.source: One more tip for integrating Rails versions prior to 3.1 is to disable the default namespacing for to_json calls on models by setting ActiveRecord::Base.include_root_in_json = false
trans-unit.target: 集成3.1之前的Rails的 to_json 一种技巧是通过设置 ActiveRecord::Base.include_root_in_json = false 禁用模型上to_json调用的默认命名空间

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return the value the collection will use to identify a model given its attributes. Useful for combining models from multiple tables with different idAttribute values into a single collection.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以返回值，集合将使用该值来标识给定其属性的模型。将来自多个表的具有不同 idAttribute 值的模型组合到单个集合中很有用。

trans-unit.source: Override this property to specify the model class that the collection contains. If defined, you can pass raw attributes objects (and arrays) and options to add, create, and reset, and the attributes will be converted into a model of the proper type using the provided options, if any.
trans-unit.target: 重写此属性以指定集合包含的模型类。如果已定义，则可以传递原始属性对象（和数组）和选项以添加，创建和重置，并且将使用提供的选项（如果有）将属性转换为适当类型的模型。

trans-unit.source: Pass null for models to create an empty Collection with options.
trans-unit.target: 为 models 传递 null 来创建带有 options 的空Collection 。

trans-unit.source: Pass null for models to empty your Collection with options.
trans-unit.target: 为 models 传递 null 来清空带有 options 的Collection 。

trans-unit.source: Please use set to update the attributes instead of modifying them directly. If you'd like to retrieve and munge a copy of the model's attributes, use _.clone(model.attributes) instead.
trans-unit.target: 请使用set来更新属性，而不是直接修改它们。如果要检索和修改模型属性的副本，请改用 _.clone(model.attributes) 。

trans-unit.source: Pluck an attribute from each model in the collection. Equivalent to calling map and returning a single attribute from the iterator.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中的每个模型中选取一个属性。等效于调用 map 并从迭代器返回单个属性。

trans-unit.source: Properties like tagName, id, className, el, and events may also be defined as a function, if you want to wait to define them until runtime.
trans-unit.target: 如果要等待定义它们，直到运行时，也可以将诸如 tagName ， id ， className ， el 和 events 之类的属性定义为一个函数。

trans-unit.source: Raw access to the JavaScript array of models inside of the collection. Usually you'll want to use get, at, or the Underscore methods to access model objects, but occasionally a direct reference to the array is desired.
trans-unit.target: 对集合内的模型的JavaScript数组的原始访问。通常，您将需要使用 get ， at 或Underscore方法来访问模型对象，但有时需要直接引用该数组。

trans-unit.source: Remember that in JavaScript, objects are passed by reference, so if you include an object as a default value, it will be shared among all instances. Instead, define defaults as a function.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，在JavaScript中，对象是通过引用传递的，因此，如果您包含一个对象作为默认值，则它将在所有实例之间共享。而是将默认值定义为函数。

trans-unit.source: Remove a model (or an array of models) from the collection, and return them. Each model can be a Model instance, an id string or a JS object, any value acceptable as the id argument of collection.get. Fires a "remove" event for each model, and a single "update" event afterwards, unless {silent: true} is passed. The model's index before removal is available to listeners as options.index.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中删除一个模型（或模型数组），然后将其返回。每个模型都可以是Model实例， id 字符串或JS对象，任何可以作为 collection.get 的 id 参数的值。除非传递了 {silent: true} ，否则将为每个模型触发一个 "remove" 事件，然后触发一个“ "update" 事件。删除之前的模型索引可作为 options.index 提供给侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Remove a previously-bound callback function from an object. If no context is specified, all of the versions of the callback with different contexts will be removed. If no callback is specified, all callbacks for the event will be removed. If no event is specified, callbacks for
trans-unit.target: 从对象中删除以前绑定的回调函数。如果没有上下文指定的，都具有不同的上下文中回调的版本将被删除。如果未指定回调，则将删除该事件的所有回调。如果未指定事件，则回调

trans-unit.source: Remove an attribute by deleting it from the internal attributes hash. Fires a "change" event unless silent is passed as an option.
trans-unit.target: 通过从内部属性哈希中删除属性来删除属性。触发 "change" 事件，除非将 silent 作为选项传递。

trans-unit.source: Remove and return the first model from a collection. Takes the same options as remove.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中删除并返回第一个模型。采用与remove相同的选项。

trans-unit.source: Remove and return the last model from a collection. Takes the same options as remove.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中删除并返回最后一个模型。采用与remove相同的选项。

trans-unit.source: Removes a view and its el from the DOM, and calls stopListening to remove any bound events that the view has listenTo'd.
trans-unit.target: 从DOM中删除视图及其 el ，并调用stopListening删除视图具有listenTo'd的所有绑定事件。

trans-unit.source: Removes all attributes from the model, including the id attribute. Fires a "change" event unless silent is passed as an option.
trans-unit.target: 从模型中删除所有属性，包括 id 属性。触发 "change" 事件，除非将 silent 作为选项传递。

trans-unit.source: Removes all of the view's delegated events. Useful if you want to disable or remove a view from the DOM temporarily.
trans-unit.target: 删除所有视图的委托事件。如果你想暂时停用或从DOM中移除一个视图,这个方法很有用。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve a hash of only the model's attributes that have changed since the last set, or false if there are none. Optionally, an external attributes hash can be passed in, returning the attributes in that hash which differ from the model. This can be used to figure out which portions of a view should be updated, or what calls need to be made to sync the changes to the server.
trans-unit.target: 只检索模型的属性的哈希自上次已更改设置，或 false ，如果有没有。 （可选）可以传入外部属性哈希，并返回该哈希中与模型不同的属性。这可以用来确定应更新视图的哪些部分，或者需要进行哪些调用才能将更改同步到服务器。

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of the model's previous attributes. Useful for getting a diff between versions of a model, or getting back to a valid state after an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 返回模型之前属性的副本。用于获取模型不同版本之间的差异,或在错误发生后回到有效状态。

trans-unit.source: Return a shallow copy of the model's attributes for JSON stringification. This can be used for persistence, serialization, or for augmentation before being sent to the server. The name of this method is a bit confusing, as it doesn't actually return a JSON string — but I'm afraid that it's the way that the JavaScript API for JSON.stringify works.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于JSON字符串化的模型属性的浅表副本。在发送给服务器之前，可以将其用于持久性，序列化或扩充。该方法的名称有点令人困惑，因为它实际上并不返回JSON字符串-但恐怕这是JSON.stringify的JavaScript API起作用的方式。

trans-unit.source: Return a shallow copy of this collection's models, using the same options as native Array#slice.
trans-unit.target: 使用与本机Array＃slice相同的选项，返回此集合的模型的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: Return an array containing the attributes hash of each model (via toJSON) in the collection. This can be used to serialize and persist the collection as a whole. The name of this method is a bit confusing, because it conforms to JavaScript's JSON API.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含集合中每个模型的属性哈希值的数组（通过toJSON）。这可以用于序列化和持久保存整个集合。此方法的名称有点混乱，因为它符合JavaScript的JSON API。

trans-unit.source: Return an array of all the models in a collection that match the passed attributes. Useful for simple cases of filter.
trans-unit.target: 返回集合中与传递的属性匹配的所有模型的数组。对于简单的 filter 案例很有用。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the attribute is set to a non-null or non-undefined value.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置为非空或非不确定值，则返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the collection with an identical list of models.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有相同模型列表的集合的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the model with identical attributes.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个具有相同属性的模型的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Backbone object back to its original value. You can use the return value of Backbone.noConflict() to keep a local reference to Backbone. Useful for embedding Backbone on third-party websites, where you don't want to clobber the existing Backbone.
trans-unit.target: 将 Backbone 对象恢复为原始值。您可以使用 Backbone.noConflict() 的返回值来保留对Backbone的本地引用。对于将Backbone嵌入到您不想破坏现有Backbone的第三方网站上很有用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the relative URL where the model's resource would be located on the server. If your models are located somewhere else, override this method with the correct logic. Generates URLs of the form: "[collection.url]/[id]" by default, but you may override by specifying an explicit urlRoot if the model's collection shouldn't be taken into account.
trans-unit.target: 返回模型资源在服务器上的相对URL。如果您的模型位于其他位置，请使用正确的逻辑覆盖此方法。默认情况下，生成的URL格式为： "[collection.url]/[id]" ，但如果不考虑模型的集合，则可以通过指定一个显式的 urlRoot 进行覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Run validate to check the model state.
trans-unit.target: 运行验证以检查模型状态。

trans-unit.source: Save a model to your database (or alternative persistence layer), by delegating to Backbone.sync. Returns a jqXHR if validation is successful and false otherwise. The attributes hash (as in set) should contain the attributes you'd like to change — keys that aren't mentioned won't be altered — but, a
trans-unit.target: 通过委派给Backbone.sync将模型保存到数据库（或替代的持久层）中。如果验证成功，则返回jqXHR，否则返回 false 。该属性的散列（如组）应该包含你想改变的属性-未提及将不会改变关键字-但是，一个

trans-unit.source: Set a hash of attributes (one or many) on the model. If any of the attributes change the model's state, a "change" event will be triggered on the model. Change events for specific attributes are also triggered, and you can bind to those as well, for example: change:title, and change:content. You may also pass individual keys and values.
trans-unit.target: 在模型上设置属性的哈希（一个或多个）。如果任何属性更改了模型的状态，则将在模型上触发 "change" 事件。还会触发特定属性的更改事件，您也可以绑定到这些事件，例如： change:title 和 change:content 。您还可以传递各个键和值。

trans-unit.source: Set the url property (or function) on a collection to reference its location on the server. Models within the collection will use url to construct URLs of their own.
trans-unit.target: 在集合上设置url属性（或函数）以引用其在服务器上的位置。集合中的模型将使用url构造自己的URL。

trans-unit.source: Similar to get, but returns the HTML-escaped version of a model's attribute. If you're interpolating data from the model into HTML, using escape to retrieve attributes will prevent XSS attacks.
trans-unit.target: 与get相似，但返回模型属性的HTML转义版本。如果要将模型中的数据插值到HTML，则使用转义检索属性可以防止XSS攻击。

trans-unit.source: Specify a urlRoot if you're using a model

Tell an object to listen to a particular event on an other object. The advantage of using this form, instead of other.on(event, callback, object), is that listenTo allows the object to keep track of the events, and they can be removed all at once later on. The callback will always be called with object as context.
trans-unit.target: 告诉一个对象侦听另一个对象上的特定事件。使用此形式而不是 other.on(event, callback, object) 优点是listenTo允许对象跟踪事件，以后可以一次将其全部删除。该回调将始终与所谓的对象为背景。

trans-unit.source: Tell an object to stop listening to events. Either call stopListening with no arguments to have the object remove all of its registered callbacks ... or be more precise by telling it to remove just the events it's listening to on a specific object, or a specific event, or just a specific callback.
trans-unit.target: 告诉对象停止收听事件。调用不带参数的stopListening来使对象删除其所有已注册的回调...或者更精确地说，是告诉对象删除在特定对象上正在侦听的事件，特定事件或特定回调。

trans-unit.source: The attributes property is the internal hash containing the model's state — usually (but not necessarily) a form of the JSON object representing the model data on the server. It's often a straightforward serialization of a row from the database, but it could also be client-side computed state.
trans-unit.target: 的属性属性是包含模型状态的内部散-通常（但不一定），表示在服务器上的模型数据JSON对象的形式。它通常是数据库中一行的简单序列化，但也可能是客户端计算状态。

trans-unit.source: The changed property is the internal hash containing all the attributes that have changed since its last set. Please do not update changed directly since its state is internally maintained by set. A copy of changed can be acquired from changedAttributes.
trans-unit.target: 该更改的属性是一个包含自上次已更改的所有属性的内部散集。请不要直接更新更改，因为它的状态由set内部维护。副本改变可以从收购changedAttributes。

trans-unit.source: The defaults hash (or function) can be used to specify the default attributes for your model. When creating an instance of the model, any unspecified attributes will be set to their default value.
trans-unit.target: 在默认设置散列（或功能）可用于指定模型中的默认属性。创建模型实例时，所有未指定的属性都将设置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: The events hash (or method) can be used to specify a set of DOM events that will be bound to methods on your View through delegateEvents.
trans-unit.target: 该事件散列（或方法）可以用来指定一组将被绑定到方法上您查看通过DOM事件的delegateEvents。

trans-unit.source: The set method performs a "smart" update of the collection with the passed list of models. If a model in the list isn't yet in the collection it will be added; if the model is already in the collection its attributes will be merged; and if the collection contains any models that
trans-unit.target: 该套方法执行与模型传递的列表中集合的“智能”的更新。如果列表中没有模型，则将其添加；否则，将添加模型。如果模型已经在集合中，则其属性将被合并；并且如果集合包含任何模型，

trans-unit.source: The sync function may be overridden globally as Backbone.sync, or at a finer-grained level, by adding a sync function to a Backbone collection or to an individual model.
trans-unit.target: 该同步功能可以全局重写为 Backbone.sync ，或在细粒度级别，通过添加 sync 功能到骨干集合或单个模型。

trans-unit.source: The events property may also be defined as a function that returns an events hash, to make it easier to programmatically define your events, as well as inherit them from parent views.
trans-unit.target: 该 events 性质也被定义为一个函数返回一个事件哈希，以使其更易于以编程方式从父视图中定义的事件，以及继承他们。

trans-unit.source: The validate method receives the model attributes as well as any options passed to isValid, if validate returns an error an "invalid" event is triggered, and the error is set on the model in the validationError property.
trans-unit.target: 该 validate 方法接收模型属性以及传递给任何选项isValid方法，如果 validate 返回错误的 "invalid" 事件被触发，并且错误被设置在模型 validationError 财产。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of fetch can be customized by using the available set options. For example, to fetch a collection, getting an "add" event for every new model, and a "change" event for every changed existing model, without removing anything: collection.fetch({remove: false})
trans-unit.target: 可以使用可用的set选项自定义获取行为。例如，要获取集合，请为每个新模型获取一个 "add" 事件，为每个已更改的现有模型获取一个 "change" 事件，而不删除任何内容： collection.fetch({remove: false})

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of render is a no-op. Override this function with your code that renders the view template from model data, and updates this.el with the new HTML. A good convention is to return this at the end of render to enable chained calls.
trans-unit.target: 渲染的默认实现是无操作。用您的代码覆盖此函数，该代码从模型数据中呈现视图模板，并使用新的HTML 更新 this.el 。一个好的约定是在渲染结束时 return this 以启用链接调用。

trans-unit.source: The following is a contrived example, but it demonstrates defining a model with a custom method, setting an attribute, and firing an event keyed to changes in that specific attribute. After running this code once, sidebar will be available in your browser's console, so you can play around with it.
trans-unit.target: 以下是一个人为设计的示例，但它演示了使用自定义方法定义模型，设置属性以及触发针对该特定属性的更改进行键控的事件。一次运行此代码后， sidebar 将在浏览器的控制台中可用，因此您可以使用它。

trans-unit.source: The method signature of Backbone.sync is sync(method, model, [options])

The routes hash maps URLs with parameters to functions on your router (or just direct function definitions, if you prefer), similar to the View's events hash. Routes can contain parameter parts, :param, which match a single URL component between slashes; and splat parts *splat, which can match any number of URL components. Part of a route can be made optional by surrounding it in parentheses (/:optional).
trans-unit.target: 路由哈希将带有参数的URL映射到路由器上的函数（或者，如果愿意，也可以只是直接函数定义），类似于View的事件哈希。路由可以包含参数部分 :param ，它们与斜杠之间的单个URL组件匹配；和splat部件 *splat ，可以匹配任意数量的URL组件。路由的一部分可以通过将其括在圆括号中 (/:optional) 来使其成为可选的。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by validate during the last failed validation.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次失败的验证过程中，validate返回的值。

trans-unit.source: There are several special options that, if passed, will be attached directly to the view: model, collection, el, id, className, tagName, attributes and events. If the view defines an initialize function, it will be called when the view is first created. If you'd like to create a view that references an element

Return false from execute to cancel the current transition. Override it to perform custom parsing or wrapping of your routes, for example, to parse query strings before handing them to your route callback, like so:
trans-unit.target: 每当路由匹配并且其对应的回调将要执行时，都会在路由器内部调用此方法。从execute 返回false以取消当前转换。覆盖它以执行路由的自定义解析或包装，例如，在将查询字符串传递到路由回调之前解析查询字符串，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: This method is left undefined and you're encouraged to override it with any custom validation logic you have that can be performed in JavaScript. If the attributes are valid, don't return anything from validate; if they are invalid return an error of your choosing. It can be as simple as a string error message to be displayed, or a complete error object that describes the error programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 此方法未定义，建议您使用可以在JavaScript中执行的任何自定义验证逻辑覆盖此方法。如果属性有效，则不要从validate返回任何内容；如果它们无效，则返回您选择的错误。它可以像要显示的字符串错误消息一样简单，也可以像完整的错误对象那样以编程方式描述该错误。

trans-unit.source: To create a Collection class of your own, extend Backbone.Collection, providing instance properties, as well as optional classProperties to be attached directly to the collection's constructor function.
trans-unit.target: 要创建自己的Collection类，请扩展Backbone.Collection，以提供实例属性以及可选的classProperties，这些属性将直接附加到集合的构造函数上。

trans-unit.source: To create a Model class of your own, you extend Backbone.Model and provide instance properties, as well as optional classProperties to be attached directly to the constructor function.
trans-unit.target: 要创建自己的Model类，可以扩展Backbone.Model并提供实例属性以及可选的classProperties，它们可以直接附加到构造函数。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that you'd like to use HTML5 pushState support in your application, use Backbone.history.start({pushState: true}). If you'd like to use pushState, but have browsers that don't support it natively use full page refreshes instead, you can add {hashChange: false} to the options.
trans-unit.target: 要表明您想在应用程序中使用HTML5 pushState 支持，请使用 Backbone.history.start({pushState: true}) 。如果您想使用 pushState ，但在本机不支持pushState的浏览器中使用整页刷新，则可以在选项中添加 {hashChange: false} 。

trans-unit.source: To supply a context value for this when the callback is invoked, pass the optional last argument: model.on('change', this.render, this) or model.on({change: this.render}, this).
trans-unit.target: 提供一个上下文为值 this 被调用的回调时，通过可选的最后一个参数： model.on('change', this.render, this) 或 model.on({change: this.render}, this) 。

trans-unit.source: Trailing slashes are treated as part of the URL, and (correctly) treated as a unique route when accessed. docs and docs/ will fire different callbacks. If you can't avoid generating both types of URLs, you can define a "docs(/)" matcher to capture both cases.
trans-unit.target: 尾部的斜杠被视为URL的一部分，并且在访问时（正确）被视为唯一的路由。 docs 和 docs/ 将触发不同的回调。如果无法避免生成两种类型的URL，则可以定义 "docs(/)" 匹配器以捕获这两种情况。

trans-unit.source: Trigger callbacks for the given event, or space-delimited list of events. Subsequent arguments to trigger will be passed along to the event callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 触发给定事件或事件的空格分隔的回调。随后触发的参数将传递给事件回调。

trans-unit.source: Uses Backbone.sync to persist the state of a collection to the server. Can be overridden for custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用Backbone.sync将集合的状态持久保存到服务器。可以因自定义行为而被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Uses Backbone.sync to persist the state of a model to the server. Can be overridden for custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用Backbone.sync将模型的状态持久保存到服务器。可以因自定义行为而被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Uses jQuery's on function to provide declarative callbacks for DOM events within a view. If an events hash is not passed directly, uses this.events as the source. Events are written in the format {"event selector": "callback"}. The callback may be either the name of a method on the view, or a direct function body. Omitting the selector causes the event to be bound to the view's root element (this.el). By default, delegateEvents is called within the View's constructor for you, so if you have a simple events hash, all of your DOM events will always already be connected, and you will never have to call this function yourself.
trans-unit.target: 使用jQuery的 on 函数为视图中的DOM事件提供声明性回调。如果未直接传递事件哈希，请使用 this.events 作为源。事件以 {"event selector": "callback"} 的格式编写。回调可以是视图上方法的名称，也可以是直接函数体。省略 selector 会使事件绑定到视图的根元素（ this.el ）。默认情况下，为您在View的构造函数中调用了 delegateEvents events ，因此，如果您有一个简单的事件哈希，则所有DOM事件将始终已连接，而您将不必自己调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Using delegateEvents provides a number of advantages over manually using jQuery to bind events to child elements during render. All attached callbacks are bound to the view before being handed off to jQuery, so when the callbacks are invoked, this continues to refer to the view object. When delegateEvents is run again, perhaps with a different events hash, all callbacks are removed and delegated afresh — useful for views which need to behave differently when in different modes.
trans-unit.target: 与在渲染过程中手动使用jQuery将事件绑定到子元素相比，使用委托事件提供了许多优势。所有连接的回调绑定到视图越区切换到的jQuery之前，所以被调用回调时， this 继续参考视图对象。当委托 events 再次运行时（可能带有不同的事件哈希），将删除所有回调并重新委托-对于在不同模式下需要以不同方式运行的视图很有用。

trans-unit.source: Web applications often provide linkable, bookmarkable, shareable URLs for important locations in the app. Until recently, hash fragments (#page) were used to provide these permalinks, but with the arrival of the History API, it's now possible to use standard URLs (/page). Backbone.Router provides methods for routing client-side pages, and connecting them to actions and events. For browsers which don't yet support the History API, the Router handles graceful fallback and transparent translation to the fragment version of the URL.
trans-unit.target: Web应用程序通常为应用程序中的重要位置提供可链接，可书签，可共享的URL。直到最近，还使用哈希片段（ #page ）提供这些永久链接，但是随着History API的到来，现在可以使用标准URL（ /page ）。Backbone.Router提供了路由客户端页面并将其连接到动作和事件的方法。对于尚不支持History API的浏览器，路由器会处理优美的后备和透明转换为URL的片段版本。

trans-unit.source: Whatever templating strategy you end up with, it's nice if you
trans-unit.target: 无论你最终采用什么样的模板策略,如果你能做到以下几点就更好了

trans-unit.source: When all of your Routers have been created, and all of the routes are set up properly, call Backbone.history.start() to begin monitoring hashchange events, and dispatching routes. Subsequent calls to Backbone.history.start() will throw an error, and Backbone.History.started is a boolean value indicating whether it has already been called.
trans-unit.target: 当所有的路由器已经建立，并且所有路由都设置正确，调用 Backbone.history.start() 开始监控 hashchange 事件，调度路线。随后对 Backbone.history.start() 的调用将引发错误，并且 Backbone.History.started 是一个布尔值，指示是否已被调用。

trans-unit.source: When called, if a route succeeds with a match for the current URL, Backbone.history.start() returns true. If no defined route matches the current URL, it returns false.
trans-unit.target: 调用时，如果路由成功匹配当前URL，则 Backbone.history.start() 返回 true 。如果没有定义的路由与当前URL匹配，则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: When creating a Collection, you may choose to pass in the initial array of models. The collection's comparator may be included as an option. Passing false as the comparator option will prevent sorting. If you define an initialize function, it will be invoked when the collection is created. There are a couple of options that, if provided, are attached to the collection directly: model and comparator.
trans-unit.target: 创建集合时，您可以选择传入模型的初始数组。集合的比较器可以作为选项包括在内。传递 false 作为比较器选项将阻止排序。如果定义初始化函数，则在创建集合时将调用该函数。有两个选项（如果提供）直接附加到集合： model 和 comparator 。

trans-unit.source: When creating a new router, you may pass its routes hash directly as an option, if you choose. All options will also be passed to your initialize function, if defined.
trans-unit.target: 创建新路由器时，可以选择直接传递其路由哈希作为选项。如果已定义，所有 options 也将传递给您的 initialize 函数。

trans-unit.source: When creating an instance of a model, you can pass in the initial values of the attributes, which will be set on the model. If you define an initialize function, it will be invoked when the model is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建模型实例时，可以传入将在模型上设置的attribute的初始值。如果定义初始化函数，则在创建模型时将调用该函数。

trans-unit.source: When the visitor presses the back button, or enters a URL, and a particular route is matched, the name of the action will be fired as an event, so that other objects can listen to the router, and be notified. In the following example, visiting #help/uploading will fire a route:help event from the router.
trans-unit.target: 当访问者按下“后退”按钮或输入URL，并且匹配特定的路线时，操作的名称将被触发为event，以便其他对象可以侦听路由器并得到通知。在以下示例中，访问 #help/uploading 将触发路由器的 route:help 事件。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a model or collection begins a sync with the server, a "request" event is emitted. If the request completes successfully you'll get a "sync" event, and an "error" event if not.
trans-unit.target: 每当模型或集合开始与服务器同步时，就会发出 "request" 事件。如果请求成功完成，您将收到 "sync" 事件，否则将收到 "error" 事件。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you reach a point in your application that you'd like to save as a URL, call navigate in order to update the URL. If you also wish to call the route function, set the trigger option to true. To update the URL without creating an entry in the browser's history, set the replace option to true.
trans-unit.target: 每当您在应用程序中到达要保存为URL的位置时，请调用Navigation以更新URL。如果还希望调用route函数，请将trigger选项设置为 true 。要更新URL而不在浏览器的历史记录中创建条目，请将replace选项设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: While templating for a view isn't a function provided directly by Backbone, it's often a nice convention to define a template function on your views. In this way, when rendering your view, you have convenient access to instance data. For example, using Underscore templates:
trans-unit.target: 虽然模板视图不是Backbone直接提供的功能，但在视图上定义模板函数通常是一个很好的约定。这样，在呈现视图时，您可以方便地访问实例数据。例如，使用下划线模板：

trans-unit.source: With the default implementation, when Backbone.sync sends up a request to save a model, its attributes will be passed, serialized as JSON, and sent in the HTTP body with content-type application/json. When returning a JSON response, send down the attributes of the model that have been changed by the server, and need to be updated on the client. When responding to a "read" request from a collection (Collection#fetch), send down an array of model attribute objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认实现时，当Backbone.sync发送保存模型的请求时，其属性将被传递，序列化为JSON，并在HTTP正文中使用内容类型 application/json 发送。返回JSON响应时，请发送已由服务器更改且需要在客户端上更新的模型属性。响应来自集合（Collection＃fetch）的 "read" 请求时，向下发送一组模型属性对象。

trans-unit.source: attributes to be sent to the server, call model.save(attrs, {patch: true}). You'll get an HTTP PATCH request to the server with just the passed-in attributes.
trans-unit.target: 要发送到服务器的属性，请调用 model.save(attrs, {patch: true}) 。您将仅使用传入的属性将HTTP PATCH 请求发送到服务器。

trans-unit.source: events on the model — including events that Backbone uses for internal bookkeeping.
trans-unit.target: 模型上的事件-包括Backbone用于内部簿记的事件。

trans-unit.target: 在DOM中，将元素作为选项传递： new View({el: existingElement})

trans-unit.source: of the resource will be sent to the server. As with set, you may pass individual keys and values instead of a hash. If the model has a validate method, and validation fails, the model will not be saved. If the model isNew, the save will be a "create" (HTTP POST), if the model already exists on the server, the save will be an "update" (HTTP PUT).
trans-unit.target: 的资源将被发送到服务器。与 set 一样，您可以传递单个键和值而不是哈希。如果模型具有验证方法，并且验证失败，则不会保存模型。如果模型是New，则保存将是 "create" （HTTP POST ），如果模型已存在于服务器上，则保存将是 "update" （HTTP PUT ）。

If you'd like to customize the behavior, you can disable it with options: {add: false}, {remove: false}, or {merge: false}.
trans-unit.target: 出现在列表中，它们将被删除。发生这种情况时，将触发所有适当的 "add" ， "remove" 和 "change" 事件。返回集合中涉及的模型。如果您想自定义行为，则可以使用以下选项禁用它： {add: false} ， {remove: false} 或 {merge: false} 。
